title: Love or Principles
itunes:title: Love or Principles
description:
Good morning everyone. Steve I know you like to turn every problem into a joke but please be kind. I'm a 39 year old black male who turned his life around 10 years ago when I left the street life and joined the Nation of Islam.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
